title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. IV, subch. E, pt. 181 - Definitions, Construction And Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. IV, subch. E, pt. 181 - Definitions, Construction And Scope

State Regulations
§ 181.1 - Definitions of words and phrases
§ 181.2 - Construction and scope

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. IV, subch. E, pt. 181

Statutory authority: Transportation Law, §71; Public

Authorities Law, §§ 453, 460; Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§100, 1627, 1630; L. 1979, ch. 370
[FN*] This Part originated as part of the regulations of
the East Hudson Parkway Authority, which was abolished as of November 1, 1979. These regulations (Originally filed as 21 NYCRR Parts
150
-
157
) were adopted as
a whole by the Department of Transportation effective November 5, 1979. Some
references, accordingly, may be
obsolete. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
